strings.ABOUT_TEXT: Google Gadgets Digital Clock LCD Copyright 2006 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved Always be able to keep track of time at a glance. The time is automatically set to your system clock. You can change the color of the clock face from a selection of 8 delicious shades with the color button. Pull it off the sidebar to place it in your favorite place on the desktop.
strings.PLUGIN_DESCRIPTION: Keep track of time with a quick glance - digitally
